item.title: xander's publications
item.description: pre-prints [in revision] Huggins, X. Gleeson, T., Castilla-Rho, J.C., Holley, C., Re, V., Famiglietti, J.S. (2023). Groundwater connections and sustainability in social-ecological systems. In review at Groundwater. [preprint] [in revision] Rohde, M.M., Albano, C.M., Huggins, X., et al. (2023). Mapping groundwater dependent ecosystems globally exposes the fragility of vulnerable ecosystems and communities. (preprint forthcoming) peer-reviewed Huggins, X. Gleeson, T., Eckstrand, H., Kerr, B. (2018). Streamflow Depletion Modeling: Methods for an Adaptable and Conjunctive Water Management Decision Support Tool.
